author: Dr. Susan Berry, Dr. Susan Berry
title: Musicians Create Virtual Choirs and Orchestras During Coronavirus Social Distancing
description: The coronavirus pandemic has not stifled the music world, as choirs, orchestras, and bands at every level are using virtual technology to perform, teach, or just send messages of hope around the world.
content:
The coronavirus pandemic has not stifled the music world, as choirs, orchestras, and bands at every level are using virtual technology to perform, teach, or just send messages of hope around the world.
